text: Soni chondechonde ngachikasakamuchisya pameso Pakwe (Allah) ikaweje kwa jwampele luusa (lwakuti achondelele). Mpaka pati woga uli utyosile m’mitima mwao (Achimalaika) akasatiji: “Ana M’mbuje gwenu juwechete ichichi?” (Achimalaika wane) akutiji: “(Jwalakwe juwechete) yakuonaonape, soni Jwalakwe ni Jwapenani kusyene, Jwankulungwa kwannope.”
